title: Neymar is better than Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi, says Italy and AC Milan legend Alessandro Costacurta of the Barcelona star
text:
EFL The Neym game Neymar is better than Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi, says Italy and AC Milan legend Alessandro Costacurta of the Barcelona star 
Alessandro Costacurta claims Neymar is the best in the world, ahead of both Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi By Sam Street Comments NEYMAR is now the best player in the world, according to five-time Champions League winner Alessandro Costacurta. 
The AC Milan and Italy legend claims the Brazilian has now reached a different level to both Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi . Rex Features 4 Neymar is now the best player in the world, according to Alessandro Costacurta 
Costacurta told Sky Italia: “Actually, I believe in this moment Neymar is better than Cristiano Ronaldo and Messi, he’s the best player in the world now, in 2017. 
Keep up to date with ALL the latest Football news, gossip and rumours 
“If we take a look at his performances and we compare them with those of Messi and Ronaldo, I think Neymar is just better at the moment.” 
The former defender added that Neymar’s personality reminds him more of Ronaldo than Messi. He’s very active on social media but he doesn’t have the same qualities of Ronaldo.” PA:Press Association The former AC Milan defender won five Champions League titles Getty Images Cristiano Ronaldo is no longer at Neymar’s level, according to the Italian AP:Associated Press 4 And it is Neymar, rather than Lionel Messi (above) who Costacurta believes is Barcelona’s star performer 
During Barcelona’s epic comeback against PSG to win 6-5 on aggregate, Neymar took centre-stage while Messi took a back seat.
